name: Dragonborn's Hoard - Mine! Mine! Mine!
description:
Take your trusty pickaxe-bow down to the mystery mines and find as much ore as you can before you reach the end. Be wary of the nasty creatures that live down there.

Keyboard Controls:

E - Mine

Spacebar - Shoot

Gamepad Controls:

Y/Triangle - Mine

A/X - Shoot

Bug fixes:

  • Screen shake fixed
  • Pickups collision should be consistent
  • Door collision fixed
  • Enemies no longer take damage twice from one crossbow

Art: Fxy

Programming: DefinitelyNotAShark
